title: The draped bust includes the collarbones and part of the breast. The greater part of the Lady, perhaps Octavia nose and the outer edges of the ears are lost as well as a large chip from the chin. Otherwise, the bust is in ex-Minor cellent condition, the surface marred only by small chips and minor abrasions in the areas of the right eye, 72.AA.106 mouth and along the outer edges of the draped bust. Head turned slightly to the right. Slight use of drill for Italian marble, the curve of the mouth and eye orbits. H: 0.54 m. The closest comparison is clearly the portrait bust in the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek no
